mk.tmdb.exception

Class TMDbResponseException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • mk.tmdb.exception.TMDbResponseException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TMDbResponseException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Signals that the server response is not a success. For more information about the error check the status response by calling getStatus method.
    Author:
    Mirko Polato
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TMDbResponseException()
      Default constructor: creates a new instance of ResponseException with the status FAILED.
      TMDbResponseException(TMDbStatus status)
      Creates a new instance of ImageSizeNotSupportedException with the given status.
